Hi All,
I need to run some long multithreaded load tests with JUnit, but I =
find the tests fail before completion at exactly 1200 seconds. Is this a gl=
obal timeout JUnit has? I'm annotating the test with @Test(timeout =3D xxxx=
x) to try to bypass this restriction, but it's not working.
Any suggestions=
 to make this work?
Thanks a lot,
Marcelo.
